ref.mixed-citation:
Bailey HM
Mathai JK
Berg EP
Pork products have digestible indispensable amino acid scores (DIAAS) that are greater than 100 when determined in pigs, but processing does not always increase DIAAS. J Nutr 2020; 150: 475– 482. 31758187

note.p: Data on ileal amino acid digestibility of pork products with various treatments in cannulated pigs.
